Articles.Content: Should I create a KSP youtube channel? If so, how should I go about doing it?

U can but i would recommend posting stuff about all topics at first to know what ur audiance like.

 

U can use my channel as a refrence : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz1xNKiXzLdS7c2RZPxm-fg

9 minutes ago, Max von Kerman said:

U can but i would recommend posting stuff about all topics at first to know what ur audiance like.

 

U can use my channel as a refrence : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz1xNKiXzLdS7c2RZPxm-fg

Your channel is good, but I see why it doesn't have many subs, and a very simple fix.

 

Your videos are beyond laggy! If KSP itself is that laggy, you should turn down the graphics as much as possible.
I think theres a lot of KSP vids and youtubers out at this point, makes it harder to get noticed unless you do something unique or unusual.
the most inportant thing is to be unique and intresting.  its inportant to know what to actually include in the video so it does not get repetetive or uninteresting
This work of a fan has been moved to Fan Works.
